meanings: [명사] abandonment, (권리·지위 등의) (formal) renunciation, [동사] give up (on), abandon, (formal) renounce
Noun [보통 old ~] 시대에 뒤진 사람, 완고한 구식 사람

vlive.korean: [포기...] [Gives up ...] View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 우리들의 행복한 시간
포기하고 싶을 때? When you want to give up? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 산이의 소소한 일상🥰
vlive.english: When you want to give up?

vlive.korean: '포기하고 싶을 때 어떻게 극복했어요?' "How did you overcome it?" 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 산이의 소소한 일상🥰
[아이스크림은 Cool~하게 포기] - 아이스크림 우리 있어 - 고! [Giving up on ice ream] - We have some in the fridge. - Go! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Giving up on ice ream] - We have some in the fridge. - Go!

vlive.korean: [너무 감격한 나머지 사랑의 편지 낭독 포기 선언] 이건 네가 읽어주면 안 돼? [He gives up reading this because he's so moved] Can you read this one for me? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “아기천사즈 칭찬 대파티” (한결, 도현 : H&D)
vlive.english: [He gives up reading this because he's so moved] Can you read this one for me?

examples.korean: They had relinquished all hope that she was alive. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그녀가 살아 있으리라는 모든 희망을 포기해야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They had relinquished all hope that she was alive. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He counselled them to give up the plan. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그들에게 그 계획을 포기하라는 조언을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He counselled them to give up the plan. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Despite all these discouragements, she refused to give up. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 모든 방해 요소들에도 불구하고 그녀는 포기하지 않으려 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Despite all these discouragements, she refused to give up. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She put forward some cogent reasons for abandoning the plan. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 그 계획을 포기해야 할 몇 가지 설득력 있는 이유를 제기했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She put forward some cogent reasons for abandoning the plan. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She doesn’t give up easily. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 쉽게 포기하지 않는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She doesn’t give up easily. Add to Wordbook
